title: [Pixel 2] Camera interface messed up in Android 10 with gesture navigation
content:
After upgrading to Android 10, elements of the camera interface are overlapping. It's more an inconvenience than a deal breaker, but an annoying one. I've attached a screenshot.

The issue occurs ONLY when using Gesture Navigation.

Things I've tried: phone restarted; camera cache cleared; changed font size from largest to default; changed display from largest to default.

Camera version: 6.3.026.265696615
Android Versioin: 10 (QP1a.190711.020)
